channel.title: Comments on: Ronnie B, Musings on a Muse: Part 1
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: Paul
item.dc:creator: Paul
item.description: How forthright and well-written! Thank you Renee!
item.content:encoded: How forthright and well-written! Thank you Renee!

item.title: By: Ronnie Goodwin
item.dc:creator: Ronnie Goodwin
item.description: Hi Renee, it's me, Ronnie, what a beautiful piece, and how 'in the middle of nowhere' brough you creative writing back, I am honored to have been mentioned in you story ?
item.content:encoded: Hi Renee, it’s me, Ronnie, what a beautiful piece, and how ‘in the middle of nowhere’ brough you creative writing back, I am honored to have been mentioned in you story ?
